text: This is a compilation of the results of the teams representing Austria at official international women's football competitions, that is the UEFA Women's Cup and its successor, the UEFA Women's Champions League. As of the 2016–17 edition Austria is ranked 9th in the UWCL's association standings, and it is thus one of twelve associations currently granted two spots in the competition.UEFA It has appeared in the quarterfinals once, through Neulengbach in the 2013–14 edition.Kurier ==Teams== These are the five teams that have represented Austria in the UEFA Women's Cup and the UEFA Women's Champions League. {| class="wikitable sortable" ! width=200px|Club !! Founded !! width=200px|State !! width=150px|Location !! align=center|Appearances !! First !!
